steps.title: Understand the Purpose of the ifconfig Command

verify.name: Verify ifconfig command output
verify.hint: The ifconfig command should display information about your network interfaces, including the IP address, subnet mask, and MAC address. Make sure to run the command with sudo privileges.

steps.title: Explore the Basic Syntax and Options of ifconfig

verify.name: Verify ifconfig options
verify.hint: The ifconfig command should have assigned the IP address 192.168.1.100 with a subnet mask of 255.255.255.0 to the eth0 interface. Make sure to run the command with sudo privileges.

verify.name: Verify interface creation and configuration
verify.hint: The ifconfig command should have created a new network interface named enp0s8 with the IP address 192.168.2.100 and subnet mask 255.255.255.0. Make sure to run the commands with sudo privileges.
